Hi everyone,

I was wondering if anyone knows of a good source(s) for maps =
from the Sengoku Jidai.  In particular, locations of battles, castles, temp=
les, and other significant sites.

Samurai Archives has a number of decent =
maps, but I am looking for other sources too.  Books, websites, etc...

One=
 thing I have noticed is that if you look at multiple sources you often get=
 multiple (slightly different) accounts of stories or locations/names.  So,=
 I am trying to broaden my sources.
For example, there is a map from Turnbu=
ll documenting Hojo expansion in the Kanto, and it really isn't clear if he=
 is being overly generous or not since he "gives" them the Satomi domain pr=
ior to the final siege of Odawara.

Also, I would be okay with looking at m=
aps in japanese, if anyone knows of some good ones.  My Japanese is not gre=
at, but I can usually do enough translation on individual words/terms/place=
s to get the gist.

Anyways, thanks in advance.
-dennis
